title: Amy Shuster Makes Pasta con Ceci
description:
Referenced in this episode 

  • Victoria Granoff's Pasta con Ceci recipe
  • Kristen's Genius article about Pasta con Ceci
  • Watch Kristen cook the recipe

Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.

Theme Music by The Cabinetmaker on Blue Dot Sessions
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore, Amy Shuster)

itunes:title: Amy Shuster Makes Pasta con Ceci
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Amy Shuster
itunes:summary: It’s astonishing how much comfort you can derive—fast—out of basic ingredients you’ve used a thousand times. Listen along as Genius Recipe Tapes producer, Amy Shuster, cooks her way through this perfect weeknight dinner recipe while offering some tips, tricks, and insights along the way.
